text: hi I'm Joel Martin with HFS Research i'm
leading our overall AI transformation
strategy at HFS Research we've always
believed in changing the status quo we
built our reputation by making research
open and accessible and now we're taking
the next big leap ai is transforming
every industry including ours the
research and advisory industry this is
why we partnered with AWS and Lizer AI
lizer's advanced AI agent framework
transforms thousands of research reports
into dynamic conversations while AWS
provides a scalable secure cloud
infrastructure that's making it all
possible our clients don't have time to
sift through hundreds of reports they
need actionable insights instantly our
AIdriven platform is delivering
personalized contextaware responses
empowering decision makers with
immediate relevant information research
now works for our clients not the other
way around however building something
like this requires serious technology
aws is providing the scalable secure and
reliable technologies that we use such
as Bedrock and Nova these are allowing
us with scalable cost-effective ways to
leverage the best large language and
frontier models we need to deliver our
research ai isn't just about changing
how we serve our clients it's also
transforming how we operate internally
we are embedding AI into all of our
workflows helping our research teams our
sales teams and our marketing teams
access insights faster collaborate more
effectively and ultimately provide
better customer service this is about
making our own business as agile and as
intelligent as the insights that we
deliver but innovation has to be
responsible and that's why we're working
closely with AWS and Lizer to ensure
that we're building our platform on a
transparent secure and trustworthy
platform ai should empower better
decision-m not replace human expertise
and that's exactly how we're approaching
this transformation of our business this
isn't about keeping up with technology
for HFS it's about redefining what
research and advisory should be in the
AI era with AWS and Lizer we are
pioneering a new standard making
research more powerful accessible and
impactful than ever before
